text: Judge a man by his questions rather than his answers.
author: Pierre-Marc-Gaston

text: Early to bed and early to rise, makes a man healthy, wealthy, and wise.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: The world is changed by your example, not by your opinion.
author: Paulo Coelho

text: If at first the idea is not absurd, then there is no hope for it.
author: Albert Einstein

text: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
author: Amelia Earhart

text: No one ever achieved greatness by playing it safe.
author: Harry Gray

text: Use your fear... It can take you to the place where you store your courage.
author: Amelia Earhart

text: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try again. Fail again. Fail better.
author: Samuel Beckett

text: Excellence is not a skill. It is an attitude.
author: Ralph Marston

text: I never lose. I either win or learn.
author: Nelson Mandela
